Dr. Amara Okonkwo

‚Üê Back to all notes

AI Ethicist

AI ethicist and policy advisor focused on fairness and accountability in machine learning systems

Dr. Amara Okonkwo is a productivity researcher and consultant who helps individuals and organizations optimize their workflows and implement deep work methodologies. Her research combines psychology, neuroscience, and practical productivity techniques.

Research Areas

  • Productivity Science
  • Workflow Optimization
  • Deep Work Methodologies
  • Attention Management

Consulting Work

  • Works with Fortune 500 companies on productivity strategies
  • Develops custom workflow solutions
  • Runs productivity workshops and training programs
  • Author of productivity best practices

Background

Dr. Okonkwo holds a PhD in Organizational Psychology and has published extensively on productivity and focus in the modern workplace.
